name: Culturelive

commands.description: Let us help you use your recognition tool
commands.title: help

commands.description: Share your ideas for using Culturelive in your company
commands.title: suggest

commands.description: Capture key moments from your conversations and spotlight them as recognition
commands.title: Flag as recognition

longDescription:
Culturelive boosts everyday engagement at work through recognition. We empower employees to value each other, linking appreciation and reward in a way that's a win-win for talents and business.

Our gamified experience and rituals will make recognition the backbone of a cultural transformation within your company, bringing satisfaction and a sense of belonging to your teams.

Culturelive extension for Microsoft Teams offers a seamless recognition experience and empowers employees to:
- recognize everyday behaviors that make a difference
- celebrate all impactful moments with their communities
- get real-time notifications, actions will never go unnoticed
- interact with our Bot via our Command-Line-Interface

In order to use this app, you need to have an active Culturelive account. If you are interested, please contact us at [hello@culture-live.com](mailto:hello@culture-live.com) or via our [contact form](https://culture-live.com/contact-us).
